name: Zyx
overview: Zyx is a puzzle game. The game starts with two fixed points on a board. Arrows move slowly from the top, bottom, left or right onto the board. You can turn the direction of the arrow and move it up/down or left/right. If the arrow does not stop on one of the board fields the game is over. When the arrows are placed in the correct formation they will disappear. Published in Magic Disk 64 1990/11.
